titles.title: Military Retirement Credit for Distance Learning Act
Military Retirement Credit for Distance Learning Act

A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to provide credit toward computation of years of service for nonregular service retired pay for completion of remotely delivered military education or training.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Military Retirement Credit for Distance Learning Act
This bill allows a credit of up to 10 points toward computation of years of service for retired pay upon successful completion of a course of instruction using electronically delivered methodologies to accomplish military education or training.
